H0.text: Light and sound are the two types of energy that travel in waves, as Marta studied different forms of energy.

H1.text: Electrical and sound are the two types of energy that travel in waves, as Marta found in her study of different forms of energy.

H2.text: Chemical and light are the two types of energy that travel in waves, as studied by Marta.

H3.text: Chemical and electrical energy are the two types of energy that travel in waves, as identified by Marta in her study of different forms of energy.

A5.text: Energy can be transferred between systems in a variety of ways, including the transmission of electromagnetic energy via photons

A6.text: Mechanical and electromagnetic waves transfer energy, momentum, and information, but they do not transfer particles in the medium.
